website_summaries.verdict: 3 sets of gel pads let you choose how much arch support you want in these adjustable pads.
pros: Helps conditions like plantar fasciitis, strains, sprains, and heel spurs
Reduces pain elsewhere by maintaining foot alignment
Contains soft gel inserts for extra support and comfort
cons: Gel inserts may feel a little hard, but that's so they provide support instead of quickly flattening under body weight

customer_reviews.title: I still had a dull ache in my feet
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews, but I had to for these braces. I've had plantar Fasciitis for 5 years. After wearing arches, foot supports and doing stretching exercises, I still had a dull ache in my feet. I was tired of that ache, and happened across socks and arch supports on Amazon. I chose these arch supports, and am glad I did. I wear them at home while doing my housework. After a couple of days, I noticed that my feet no longer ache! I am so excited! For the first time in 5 years, I am pain free!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pad too small
customer_reviews.text: Concept is great but the silicone "pad" is barely larger than a silver dollar. It needs to be bigger to cover more area of the arch of your foot. I tried to push past the pain that these caused thinking I'd get used to it but they are just too small for a woman size 10 foot. It may work if you have really small feet. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought one like this several years ago when I had plantar fasciitis. I haven't had it for a while but I am now being plagued by it again and my old one was, well old, and I needed a new one. I looked at several on Amazon and found this Arch Support Brace, which looked like my old one, and bought it. I also bought another one that was a slip on. This one fits better as I can adjust the strap. The slip on one is OK but the gel support is a little soft. This one is much better. I even recommended it to a friend for her husband. I recommend this brace to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Susie

customer_reviews.title: You will be out money as this item is NOT returnable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the mostly positive reviews but I am 100% disappointed. Just a horrible item. It will not stay in place well and slips on the foot and causes more discomfort than the pain I already have. Then I tried to return the item and get a message from Amazon that this item is "not returnable". I thought this item was guaranteed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marivic

customer_reviews.title: great idea didn't work for me unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. I have flat feet and must wear orthotics so sandals are out. I thought I could wear these and then wear sandals then but all sizes given have shapes where the "support"/inserts of different sizes are too concentrated. They might work better if the inserts' sizes were more spread out because as they are they're like having a stone in my arch. But great idea! just spread out the length of inserts so more supportive and comfortable. I am men's size 11.
customer_reviews.author: Since You Asked

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging and quality control
customer_reviews.text: These braces come with 3 sizes of silicone gel inserts, S-M-L. The large inserts came installed in the braces, and the two other sizes were packaged separately in their own little plastic pouches. However, I only received ONE of the small size insert, instead of 2. I did get 2 of the medium. But I need both of the smalls. This is so frustrating, I was desperate to get these today because my foot is in bad shape. Now the braces are not very useful and it’s a big hassle to return them. So basically this is a big ripoff as well as a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: madge

customer_reviews.title: Not Perfect, but the Best Relief I've Found
customer_reviews.text: **Update: I added a star because I switched to a foot compression sleeve because I thought that would help more with the plantar fasciitis pain, but after 2 weeks I went back to these arch support braces and found that these help MORE than the sleeves. So they're still not perfect, but they're the best relief I've found yet. -------- Original review: These are okay. They do help somewhat with short-term plantar fascitis pain relief, but they don't take away the pain completely, and they're not good with long-term relief. As soon as I take them off, my feet hurt again.
customer_reviews.author: TriciaCKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I like these...
customer_reviews.text: A nice replacement to an older pair I had. Support is good at the arch. One question: the supports arrived with med. size silicon pads inside the arch area, but also included one silicon pad in size sm. and another in a size med.?? I can understand including pads in another size so the customer can customize the fit, but this makes no sense. No matter what you do, you would always need two pads in a size. Otherwise, I like the arch supports.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila P.

customer_reviews.title: RELIEF - AHHHH
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband who suffers terribly with peripheral neuropathy in his feet due to Type II Diabetes. I took a chance. He is always complaining about his feet hurting, every day and night. When we received them this week (quick delivery) he was skeptical but gave them a try. Immediate RELIEF for him! He even wore them to bed and did not get up at all to take a Tylenol or sit in the chair to elevate his feet as he usually does. Slept through the night. Happily he can even wear them in his everyday shoes, too. No interference, at all. He is ONE HAPPY GUY! Thank You! wIll probably order more - for backups.
customer_reviews.author: EMC

customer_reviews.title: Gel pads too thick
customer_reviews.text: I like that that the straps give you the flexibility to adjust the support. Unfortunately, the gel inserts were to large ( even the small ones) and the brace really hurt my foot. The brace came with one pair of gel pads already inside the brace. Then there were two extra PIECES, not pairs, of gel. One piece was small and the other one was medium. It was odd that both pieces were not the same size unless it was just for sizing in case you didn’t like the gel size that the brace came with. Unfortunately, this brace was painful for my feet and didn’t work out for me at all. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Parker

customer_reviews.title: Sooo happy I bought these
customer_reviews.text: Omgosh!!! I am so happy I bought these. I suffer from plantar fasciitis and bone spurs AND TOTALLY flat feet. These have helped so much. So far I’ve only used the small pads and I have so much better walks with my doggies and my legs and feet don’t get sore. I even put them on when I have my slippers on. I broke an ankle several years ago and have permanent scars and swelling so I knew I’d be miserable in anything that compressed my ankle. Well worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jolene's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear it for long time! Back pain goes away!
customer_reviews.text: It works! I have tried numerous flat foot products to make my feet feel better and this wrap really works, and most importantly, It is comfortable enough that I can wear it for a long time. For many that don’t know, flat feet slowly hurts your back and develops chronic back pain over time. I am using this product to hope my back pain goes away one day. Will update in a few month when I have the chance to use it more often.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Already used.
customer_reviews.text: Product came "pre-broke in," aka it has already been used. The medium were already in the unit, and they were stained yellow. It's really gross that they would send back one that has clearly been used. The package definitely looked like it had beaned opened prior to me, but figured I would open and give a look. Then again maybe not that bad the person tried them one once and didn't work, but then when I saw how yellow the pad was I knew they have been used for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bower

customer_reviews.title: Gorrible for high arches
customer_reviews.text: There were supposed to be 2 only received one. These also do not help a very high arch as much as I thought. My planter fasciitis is not any better after trying this product for a while now.
customer_reviews.author: SEN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome relief of heel pain from plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: During these 'virus times' my wife and I have been walking - a LOT. After several months of 100+ miles per, I started to get pretty significant heel pain from what appears (to this former massage therapist) to be plantar fasciitis. Self-care only provided minimal relief. Then I found these and have been really impressed with how they gently stretch the plantar fascia, reducing the pressure (and pain) on my heels. They are well made, the gel pads withstand being walked upon all day and they fit nicely into shoes. I also like that they come with three thicknesses of pads if/as you need to increase or decrease the pressure. Totally recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: michael@resonance

customer_reviews.title: Hard on instep
customer_reviews.text: I was very hopeful that this product would provide the support that I thought my arch needed in the wake of my dance-related plantar fasciitis tear. My podiatrist said I would need arch support and I thought this product might do the trick. Alas, although it seemed competently constructed, the little gel insert intended to give arch support was hard on my instep. For me, it felt that I was stepping on a rock. By the end of the day, I was sure my foot was going to have a huge bruise. Unfortunately, this product did not help me and I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Southwest Academy of Ballet Arts

customer_reviews.title: Huge Help for Foot/Knee Pain
customer_reviews.text: My 72yo Mom volunteers several days/week, escorting patients throughout a local hospital. She walks miles every day that she volunteers, and started complaining of foot and knee pain. I bought these and had them shipped directly to her, and voila! Her foot pain is gone and knee pain has been reduced. Great product, especially at this price point. Definitely recommend for anyone with minor aches and pains. They’re adjustable, so you can decide how tightly you’d like them to fit, something that not every product provides. Highly recommend these for patients of any age.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Relief!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They take away so much pain from my high arches. I've been wearing them to bed. If I forget to put them on, I wake up with horrific pain and cramping in my feet. Wearing these has been life changing. I have custom orthotics in my sneakers, but I don't wear shoes in the house. I put these on over my socks during the day. If not, I suffer. I am ordering a second pair, in case the other wears out. I would be lost without them. I'm surprised a doctor never suggested these. I found them by searching on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: My son had purchased these to ease heel pain. When I mentioned my back really pained me when I was on my feet more than an hour he recommended I try these. We both have high insteps so I thought..why not. What a remarkable difference. If you have back pain when you are on your feet too long, I recommend you try them strongly.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Finally pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been having heel pain for a couple of months now. He's tried soaking it, inserts, biofreeze and rolling on a tennis ball. I ordered these for him and it almost instantaneously relieved his pain. He loves it and whenever his heel hurts all he has to do is put that on and it gives him relief.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LATEX?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t see anything in the description that says these contain latex, which I am sensitive to. It says they are lined by a non-slip surface. I’m pretty sure that’s the latex. These burn and itch like crazy from it. So the only way I can wear these is over pretty thick socks or wear them inside out. I have no burning that way but the Velcro clasp then rubs on the skin. Because of the price, it’s not worth it returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Moria Vulcanus

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Unconventional
customer_reviews.text: So, I have torn tendons in my ankle. The braces my doctor gave me irritated the top of my foot (where some of the torn tendons are). The tendon that gives me the most pain in on the lateral side of my lower leg. I have swelling with pain going in to my arch. I've tried Many different braces all of them causing more pain than relief. I've had tennis elbow, and thought "why not?" I've been wearing this brace (this is my second set) for about 8 months now. It's Perfect! I put the gel pad over the swollen area and viola no more ankle pain. No more arch pain. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lita Louise

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: A nice replacement to an older pair I had. Support is good at the arch. One question: the supports arrived with med. size silicon pads inside the arch area, but also included one silicon pad in size sm. and another in a size med.?? I can understand including pads in another size so the customer can customize the fit, but this makes no sense. No matter what you do, you would always need two pads in a size. Otherwise, I like the arch supports.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and after a long day on my aching foot I look forward to coming home and putting this brace on. I can place it exactly where the pain is located and walk around pain free. This product doesn't fit in my work boots, but it does help relieve the pain, so I can sleep at night. The assorted sized gel packs are ideal so you can put the size you need in for added relief. I can wear this brace in my casual shoes in the evenings and weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great!
customer_reviews.text: These came with a full set of gel cushions that are huge and also a medium and a small insert (one of each of those sizes). With the large cushions in, it made my arch unbearably uncomfortable. If they had sent two of each of the other sized cushions, I could have worn the small. I did find wearing the straps without the cushions helped my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H.

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought these a long time ago!!!
customer_reviews.text: From the moment I put them on, I felt such foot relief! My feet are ALWAYS sore! My heels suffer so much that I prop them at night so they don't even rest on my mattress. I've been using these arch support braces and now I even fall asleep without having to prop my legs/feet. For all of you who suffer from these types of issues, try it out! I've been dealing with plantar fasciitis for over 20 years and my friend told me about this product since she had the same issue. I can go all day and no longer do my feet feel sore at the end of it. I use the medium gel support.
customer_reviews.author: nddiaz

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I have had other brands just like them. Gave 3 stars because, I know from other products, that they will need to be replaced in 4 to 6 months, when the Velcro stops adhering to the wrap. I can see the material starting to pull up where the Velcro attaches to the wrap, it won't last ... Sad, I know that there are wraps for elbows and knees that use a new style of loop that doesn't damage the wrap ... This is not it though.
customer_reviews.author: DStiefer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is made of good quality but the issue I had with the bottom up my feet this product did not help. I had to return this product because it felt uncomfortable wrapped around my feet. I am rating this product a 3 do to the return policy horrible. I paid more to return this product than I was refunded. I would advise do not buy this product if you have any doubt it will help you because the return of funds you get is not worth the return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon, Customer LAA

customer_reviews.title: Completely pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these arch supports specifically for doing yoga. I have extremely flat feet and repetitive balancing movements in yoga are near impossible and become excruciatingly painful. These supports did the trick! The quality is excellent and they are very adjustable. I did have to contact customer support because I received one small insert, two medium inserts and one large insert. My feet are so flat I have to use the smallest inserts on both feet. (I have a feeling now that they’re purposefully packaged this way.) Customer service was very prompt to reply and fixed the issue quickly! I’m very pleased all around!
customer_reviews.author: Catania

customer_reviews.title: Gel Straps Work, Fit and Stay in Place!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised that these actually work. They do work--at least for arch support. In fact, I'm wearing them now--as arch support in my rubber garden shoes, something for which I've never had a satisfactory answer prior to these gel straps. I use the small size gel insert. There are also medium and a large size inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Inserts are HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: The concept is good, the inserts are WAY too small, like walking on a driveway rock. The insert should be as big (long and wide) as an adult foot arch, this was more like for a small child. Also, the band did not seem sturdy, felt very flimsy. I'm sending it back for a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Tania M.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING. Saved me
customer_reviews.text: I've been dealing with plantar fasccitis/heel spurs/who knows what for months. Arch inserts haven't helped, multiple types of shoes haven't helped - acupuncture helps a lot but it's still super painful. I've used roller balls, frozen roller balls, stretching, etc, and NOTHING has helped as much as these. These make it so I can walk in the morning and then the next morning isn't so bad. Debilitating pain has been much reduced with these. HIGHLY recommend. I've washed them a few times and they're still great.
customer_reviews.author: uhtred6

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and my daughter use these arch support braces and really like them. The braces come with a variety of pad thicknesses so you can use whichever size is most comfortable in the arch of your foot. The bands are flexible enough that you can comfortably stand up, even if they have been adjusted for wear while you are not standing. Other products like this often have bands that don't stretch enough to accommodate your feet while transitioning from sitting to standing and end up being too tight when you stand up.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I have very high arches and have had more and more pain in my feet as I grow older. I wear special insoles when I go out but don't like to wear them in my house. These supports have given me the option of wearing my slippers in the house! I also like the Velcro strapes that allow me to tighten them as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome relief
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. They definitely provide relief for those with high arches and/or plantar problems. Of course does not solve the long term issue but provides some serious immediate help. Highly recommended. One note: the pointy end aims towards the pinky toe when putting on. They really should have some instructions. I would put a paycheck on the fact that some people are wearing them backwards and think they don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: •dewbs•

customer_reviews.title: Really made a difference
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I seem to get pain at night when trying to sleep more than I do during the day and these worked really well. They don't cut off circulation and apply just enough pressure for pain relief. And my feet dont get hot!! I also used them with yoga. Since I'm barefoot with no support like my shoes my feet will ache after a while but these made a big difference. I did still ache by the end of an hour but I'm sure that will get better as I lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: Christina T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Solution
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! They have great support and I love having the option of different arch sizes to improve my lack of an arch. Very comfortable and I forget I’m even wearing them. Arch pain has gone away. Oh and I love that I don’t have to wear shoes around the house to have arch supports! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these supports for mild plantar facitis pain. They came with 3 different pairs of arch inserts which was great because only 1 fit my foot comfortably. The support does help but don't expect it to take away your pain completely. They were advertised to fit in your shoe but unless you have shoes that aren't snug to your feet it will not fit. I'm still happy with the product because I bought them more for wearing at home with slippers anyways.
customer_reviews.author: irongiant224

customer_reviews.title: Not at all comfortable and tried to return but they are asking to pay  Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Thought this will relieve my pain but it is not at all comfortable more over it creates pain and puts on more pressure on my leg.Tried to return this item and they are charging for shipment which is insane. Don’t buy this untill you are sure that it will work for you. Read reviews and bought this. Ended up loosing some bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amarnath

customer_reviews.title: Relieved my plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to alleviate pain on my left foot. I really like how there are three different inserts that have increasing levels of support. I wear a size 11.5 wide shoe and the strap was big enough to fit my foot. Provided immediate relief. Since its not an insole, you can use it no matter what shoe you are wearing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can place the cushioned portion exactly where ...
customer_reviews.text: what a difference these have made for me. I love that you can place the cushioned portion exactly where you need and adjust the level of tightness as needed through the day. I had been using a fair amount of kinetic tape with pre wrap before. That was costly and time consuming plus I could not adjust the tension as needed. These have helped my arch pain tremendously. Your feet are your foundation, and so important. I also use the spiked massage therapy balls on my feet and they really help too. I highly recommend these arch supports AND good shoes to start with! An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure!
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The Vive Arch Support Brace is Absolutely Awesome! Arrived quickly in nice sealed packaging. Well made product. But the Best Part is they work! I have plantar fasciitis in both feet and it was getting worse, becoming very painful, and pretty much affecting everything I did. The braces arrived with the medium size silicon insert already in, and that turned out to be perfect. My left foot Instantly stopped hurting! My right foot which, which was the worse of my 2 feet, was at 85% improvement instantly, and within a few hours was pain free as well! Absolutely Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is uncomfortable and gave me blisters
customer_reviews.text: I have to wonder if this product was ever tested... I have plantar fasciitis and high arches so I'm always looking for a good insert option for various shoe styles. One afternoon of wearing these and the stitching on the fabric gave me puffy painful blisters. Cheaply made. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Concetta

customer_reviews.title: pain releif
customer_reviews.text: This product is comfortable to wear and most of the time I forget that they are on my feet. I am anxious to wear them for my 12 hour shifts to see how my feet feel afterwards. It would be nice if there were some type of literature included with the packaging that discussed how to find the right placement for them. Without that, I had to adjust them a few times the first day to decided where they would be most beneficial. A nice inexpensive alternative to pricey orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: L. Norsworthy

customer_reviews.title: I wrote customer service and they promptly wrote me back with how to wear them to get the best benefit. The oval side should be on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive instructions in my package and unfortunately, how to wear the straps was not listed on your website. On the two straps I received, the Vive logo was not the same so it was confusing on what direction I should be wearing the straps. I wrote customer service and they promptly wrote me back with how to wear them to get the best benefit. The oval side should be on the inside of your foot and the straight line, on the outside. I've been wearing them now for a few days and do feel like they are helping my plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have extremely high arches. I hurt both my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely high arches. I hurt both my feet working out...my reasearch showed and my doctor said my arch fell this caused accessory navicular. Because of the accessory navicular I had trouble wearing shoes. I put the arch support on with open shoes it helped with the pain tremendously... I start PT this week will find out if I can still wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller, Product Needs Improvement!
customer_reviews.text: I like that the product has a Velcro closure because I've found that most of the elastic arch support products are too tight, and only offer "one size fits all." But, the arch support in this product is too big, it's very uncomfortable. If they would dial back the padding, this would be a much better product.
customer_reviews.author: Michele LM

customer_reviews.title: Best supports I’ve purchased
customer_reviews.text: These have been the best arch supports. The fact that I can change gel insert sizes is great. It lets me customize the support I need depending on the shoes I’m wearing that day. I also love the strong Velcro closures. Nothing weak about these arch supports.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wasson

customer_reviews.title: Might work better for smaller feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this arch support brace to relieve pain and support to avoid hip issues. The brace seems to support the arch ok, but only in a small specific area, which causes a hot spot of pain under the arch. I found the longer I wore the brace, the more pain I felt. The padded arch support connect tona velcro strip is too small for men’s shoe size 10. Might work better for smaller feet?
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Muse

customer_reviews.title: They are adjustable for my small foot
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, thank you for making these adjustable. I have small feet and the other arch supports were always too big and finally found these. I've had plantar fasciitis for over 15 years and wear arch support in my shoes but now I can go bare foot in the house or wear slippers or sandles with the adjustable support fitting my foot."
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several other orthotics but these are the first ones that didn’t have me in tears after the first few hours. I like that I am able to wear them with my slippers and not have to wear shoes all the time yet have the support I need.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Plantar Faciitis relief!
customer_reviews.text: The fact that these are adjustable makes them perfect for just about any use. I sleep in one so that I can walk in the morning. They work very well and thus kept me from having to have surgery for Plantar Faciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: It helps, but hard to clean...
customer_reviews.text: I like the different size inserts and ease of putting it on. I don’t like how hard it is to clean. I normally don’t have smelly feet, but wearing this all day does make them stinky. Washing the rubber inserts isn’t enough, I have to put them in charcoal bags overnight. Washing the wrap in the washing machine helps, but the chosen material is just too absorbing. Not all the smell comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and recently had a tendon issue with my right foot — I tend to not wear my orthotics as I should. These are amazing. I’m still wearing an ankle stabilizer but can wear this support inside—basically anything I can do to go barefoot!! I’m a girl raised in the south (grit), although I do wear shoes outside and these supports even in the ankle brace fit comfortably in my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Got these for a dropped arch.  Works great
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. Performed perfectly. 2 supports that are for either foot. I have a size 11 1\2 D. ( wide foot) no problem fitting then anywhere on my foot. Was surprised at the inclusion of 3 different gel pads to assist with comfort on the underside of the support. Package was delivered on 2 days. No problems. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie D

customer_reviews.title: greatness
customer_reviews.text: This has helped more than any other gadget or insert. It takes some getting use to and has to be adjusted, but my heel pain is greatly reduced. My planters fasciits was horrible. I'm a teacher and on my feet all day. I've tried special shoes. I've tried cortisone shots. Nothing worked better than these.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Creglow

customer_reviews.title: comfortable arch support
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the world of arch support (outside of inserts in heels), and am very pleased with this product. I like that they are strapped on rather than pulled on, so my feet don't get too hot. They are comfortable, the fabric and Velcro is strong. I've only worn them with low slip- ons (read: Toms): they are pretty high on the top, would make other shoes tighter, and create a noticeable lump on top of to the foot. I don't think they'd fit well with boots or shoes that don't have laces to loosen. They aren't particularly fashionable. It is for the aesthetics that I give these 4 of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for temporary relief
customer_reviews.text: Works well for fallen arches. Holds the arches up a bit while the body heals. However, if worn in shoes, these will break down the arch support of those shoes and when you wear those shoes without these on, you'll feel the depression left behind. Otherwise, easy to clean and maintain. Completely adjustable for every foot.
customer_reviews.author: Ben E

customer_reviews.title: Gave these to my daughter and she loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter claims the "bones" in her flat feet are actually popping back into place. Overall it sounds horrible, but she seems to think it's the greatest thing ever.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ferret

customer_reviews.title: Not good for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit. Not good for wide feet though. Doesn’t offer enough support for my wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé suffers from flat feet and discomfort which stems from this condition. He has stated the inserts are very tough/hard and are not as helpful as he would like. They are well made and durable though! The inserts are easy to swap out.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Not wearing shoes in the house or yard, my feet were hurting without the support offered by shoes. These helped ALOT. They are adjustable and the silicone pads fit in a stretchy pocket. You can customize the support by using one or a combo of the pads. The velcro allows me to adjust the band (the cheaper ones I had used were small and had a one size fits all pad that didn't do much). If I were designing exactly what I wanted for shoe less arch support, this item checks all the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These support braces are part of my new routine to fix my collapsing foot arches. Along with some specific exercises these have helped my feet improve 100%. No more pain, can really feel the support. My feet are now on the way to recovery!
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Works...but don't use.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly works, but I decided to focus on rehab to address the strain and discomfort because I didn't want to get stuck using this for the rest of my life. If the foot problems were permanent I would definitely use again.
customer_reviews.author: tejanoman

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this when I wear sandals and with a compression sock when I'm training in my MMA classes. It gives me the arch support I need when I'm not wearing my good shoes and I like that there are several sizes of arches included in the package. I've bought a couple colors of these now.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J Foitik

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable support with different sized inserts!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are adjustable. I was confused when I first got them because it seemed as though they only included one gel insert for each size. After messaging them they pointed out that they often are stuck together. Just a heads up! These fit nicely. I have some pretty painful plantar fasciitis and these help me to move around with minimal pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: missing gel pieces
customer_reviews.text: I received this foot support item and I am missing some of the gel pieces. The photo shows 6 pieces of gel 2 small 2 medium and 2 large. I only received the 2 medium pieces and NOT the 2 small or the 2 large. Can you please send them to me through Amazon? I feel for maximum performance, I will need all the gel pieces. Thank you, Cathryn Luisa...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I feel ripped off. It's basically a cheap thing you wrap around your foot with a nub in one spot, that's not guaranteed to stay in the place you want it to stay in, and it's roundish shaped, which means it's awkward fit for the area it's supposed to be for. Probably my most disappointing purchase on amazon so far, and no returns either.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great for relieving your foot, leg and back pains
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for ways to alleviate my foot, legs and back pains and this really helps a lot. This pair of foot straps not only reduces the pains but stop any pain from occurring while wearing them for days. The nice thing about this is that you can adjust the inserts for your own comfort. You can wear it with your shoes without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: lhaytz

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I have found
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with plantar fasciitis for 3 years. I was considering surgery at this point as I was unable to take more than 6k steps a day. I have tried everything but everything failed. I put these on and within 30 minutes the pain had decreased tremendously. I walked barefoot (with these) for the first time in 9 months. These things are a lifesaver! And at such a low cost, what do you have to lose?!?
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Troche

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Live Without These
customer_reviews.text: Painful at first for a week tops to get adjusted to, but could not go a day without them now. Truly the best arch support for the money. If my shoes are not on, these are and they TRULY do the trick of supporting my fallen arches and improve my posture as a result as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: So many good things about this product. This comes with silicone supports so they don't get squished down over time like other products. There are three sizes of supports you can fit the support to your need. And So! Comfortable! I wear these around the house when I don't feel like wearing shoes but still need arch support. One of the best purchase I've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Wicklund

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely high arches and my doctor told me I should wear shoes with support even in the house. I hate wearing shoes inside. I found these and they are amazing! They give me the support I need, they are comfortable, and I do not have to wear shoes to get the support I need. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: S. Silva

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it might not seem like much from the pics, but these things really work! Pressure is applied directly to the arch and foot tendons, and you can make it as tight or as lose as you like. 4 stars for now, until I see how long they last. But so far so great.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody Special

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: Good support for my plantar fascitis, 3 inserts makes it easy to customize, easy to wear without shoes like for a walk on the beach and cleans very easily with soap and water and dries fast! Got another pair in black as beige color was out of stock (would have preferred those but oh well)
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & Convenience
customer_reviews.text: I have high arches - these do offer support. Also makes the bunion on the outside of the 5th metatarsal feel better. Initially, I wore them under my socks then went to over my socks which was more comfortable. After 20 or so uses the Velcro loses its ability to stay closed and I bought another pair.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It has helped my mild plantar fasciitis a lot. Placement of the gel strap and using the correct size (small/large) is very important. I move it around until it feels just right with my shoe on and it helps enormously through out the day.
customer_reviews.author: GGhomiedog

customer_reviews.title: Best arch supports I've tried
customer_reviews.text: These have been the best arch supports I have tried by far. I do get some irritation if I wear them without socks on the top of my foot so I can't wear them with sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Barkley1017

customer_reviews.title: pain free comfortable support
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product very much. It works for me. 1. its adjustable 2. easy to wear in shoes or slippers 3. the material does not sweat. 4. easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief overnight
customer_reviews.text: Great support. It has eliminated my pain that I was experiencing after my treadmill workouts. Although I am not using the added arch support, if needed -. It has a couple of inserts to meet that need as well
customer_reviews.author: mlctulsa

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMIZABLE!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried all 3- small, medium and large inserts, found a medium on one foot and a large on the other fit perfectly. Just got them today been wearing them all day so far, my feet feel AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Duff

customer_reviews.title: It helps
customer_reviews.text: I like it but i would have doubles of both supports. Mine came with a pair of smalls 1 med and 1 large. But it does help
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Hurt
customer_reviews.text: Might work for others but caused me more pain and didn't like will be returning it. Didn't get to use cause it hurt to bad to try
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: The
customer_reviews.text: My foot pain isn't completely gone but it is diminishing over time. I wear these around the house and to sleep and I like that they don't cause discomfort when I sleep.. I was hesitant to try anything compression-type overnight for fear of making my foot pain worse but
customer_reviews.author: Natt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Was able to use these in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Was able to use these in my running shoes and it really helped with the arch support. It’s great that you can adjust it to fit your feet as I also have an unusually high instep.
customer_reviews.author: Suga

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brace because I discovered I have a significant over-pronation that caused tendinitis in my ankle (so not for Plantar Fasciitis specifically). This brace gives a perfect amount of arch support when worn inside shoes. I'd prefer a bit more support when worn barefoot, but it's still far better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk L

customer_reviews.title: Fit comfortably and have 3 different sizes for different support
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use. Just wrap it around my foot, I found the smallest arch worked best for me. Doesn't stay exactly in place if your walking around alot, but for 90% of the time I had no issues. I like them alot.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Berlinski

customer_reviews.title: Great for relief from running injuries
customer_reviews.text: I recently developed moderate pain in my feet from running without orthotics. After wearing these braces for a day the pain is almost entirely gone! I’m very impressed since no amount of massaging helped, but these did with no extra effort. I’m a size 10W and have very high arches and these fit well and don’t slide around.
customer_reviews.author: ShmooKat

customer_reviews.title: These work
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and pain at my arches. I like that you can change out the size of the supports as needed and that the strap is adjustable. The downside is that depending on the style of shoe, these can be very visible. If you have shoes that are on the tight side, these may not work with them at all. I will be buying other colors to blend better because these really do help.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I like these much better than other alternatives I have used in the past. I work at a standing desk, and they provide great support all day.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W

customer_reviews.title: Great support whenever I need!
customer_reviews.text: I've had arch pain in my foot for years now. Recently it got to where I couldn't handle it any more. I realized my shoes may be the culprit. These supports were my way of not throwing the shoes away, but still remaining comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have high arches and always need to add additional arch support to all my shoes. I stumbled upon this product on Amazon The idea of wearing the support on my feet instead of in my shoes/slippers was intriguing. I am thrilled. I’ve been wearing them for 5 days now and my hip pain is finally gone. Amazing what support in exactly the right place does for your body. Best thing I’ve ever given myself.
customer_reviews.author: Susan McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: What a fantastic discovery!
customer_reviews.text: What a great discovery! I like not having to always wear orthotics in the house. I can wear this and still have the support I need. I've been pain free in bare feet! The only small negative is that I have size 11 wide feet and this might be a little small. But it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Adiamond8

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised at how quickly I got relief from Plantar Fasciitis on my left foot! I'm not sure if it's because I started treating it early and started using the arch support brace, but I have been able to return to my regular work outs and running without pain! It's been incredible!
customer_reviews.author: A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Pain free walking
customer_reviews.text: A simple design, easy to wear and helps me be able to walk without pain. I like the ease of washing it by hand and letting it air dry. I've had other designs, but the simplisty of this one makes it Superior to multi strapped ones
customer_reviews.author: EllyB

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I rated 4 stars because of missing pieces. Only received 1each of small and medium inserts. The missing inserts were sent quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Imma

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but not for dress shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-constructed product, does the job (I use it for arthritis pain), and works especially well for small feet (women's size 6 in my case). The only reason it does not get a 5=star rating is that it advertises the brand and the edging around the band is thick enough that you can't wear this under stockings without being very obvious. I bought these to replace a similar product I have had for over 10 years, but is no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: CMH

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped for these to be a little more comfortable but they actually hurt. Kind of feels like a rock in your shoes. Depending on level of sensitivity of your feet this may work well for others.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: YES. Finally. PF Relief.
customer_reviews.text: OW. If you have high arches this is great. they work with flip flops and the other day, I put them on with heels as I walked around my office... Really helps with PF if you have the arch issue. I have tried three other brands and this one works. Thank you!”
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin Gal

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay put
customer_reviews.text: If I could get it to stay put for my arch it works great. But it slides down. To keep it from sliding you have to make it really tight and then it hurts. I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vive Arch Support Brace (Pair) - Plantar Fasciitis Gel Strap for Men, Woman - Orthotic Compression Support Wrap Aids Foot Pain, High Arches, Flat Feet, Heel Fatigue - Insert for Under Socks (Gray)
feature_bullets: PLANTAR FASCIITIS AND HEEL PAIN RELIEF: Providing relief from painful foot conditions such as plantar fasciitis, heel spurs, strains and sprains, the adjustable compression brace supports the arch while in motion to reduce pain while exercising, hiking or walking. The adjustable arch brace also relieves knee, hip and back pain by maintaining proper foot alignment.

ADJUSTABLE COMPRESSION SUPPORT: Supplying upward compression and support, the arch support brace has an integrated pouch that holds up to three soft gel inserts for added support and comfort. The brace lifts and supports the arch while standing and helps to maintain proper foot alignment during motion, both pronation and supination. Designed for comfort, the low-profile arch brace can be worn with most shoes and sandals, with or without socks or barefoot.

STAYS IN PLACE ALL DAY: Secure the brace in the most comfortable position with the strong fastener strap that also allows the level of compression to be adjusted for optimal support and comfort. The inner lining is made with a non slip material that holds the brace firmly in place, eliminating slipping, bunching and pinching for a comfortable, secure fit.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND BREATHABLE: The lightweight arch support does not add bulk to your foot, easily fitting in most shoes. Constructed with a breathable, latex-free material, the brace also remains cool and dry throughout the day for exceptional comfort.
VIVE GUARANTEE: 60 day unconditional guarantee so you can purchase now with confidence.
